languages.text: "Слыхал о том, что в фамильном склепе творилось? Говорят, там еретики с какими-то чудищами гнездо свили и Лорд-капитан их лично перебил{mf||а}!"
"You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"
languages.original_text: "Слыхал о том, что в фамильном склепе творилось? Говорят, там еретики с какими-то чудищами гнездо свили и Лорд-капитан их лично перебил{mf||а}!"

traits.locale_text: "Have you heard what went down at the family vault? They say heretics and some kind of monsters had made a nest there and the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} killed them off!"
"Have you heard what went down at the family vault? They say heretics and some kind of monsters had made a nest there and the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} killed them off!"
"Have you heard what happened down in the crypt? They say heretics and monsters of some sort had nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} dispatched them!"
"Have you heard what happened down in the crypt? They say heretics and monsters of some sort had nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} dispatched them!"
"You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"
"You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and swatted them all!"

languages.text: «¿Os habéis enterado de lo de la cripta? Dicen que había un puñado de herejes y monstruos atrincherados allí, pero ¡{mf|el|la} Lord Capitán en persona fue a aniquilarlos!».
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Os habéis enterado de lo de la cripta? Dicen que había un puñado de herejes y monstruos atrincherados allí, pero ¡{mf|el|la} Lord Capitán en persona fue a aniquilarlos!».

languages.text: 「地下室で何があったか聞いたか？異端者やら怪物やらが大量に巣くっていたけど、ロード・キャプテンが自ら足を運んで殲滅したんだってさ！」
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"

traits.locale_text: 「地下室で何があったか聞いたか？異端者やら怪物やらが大量に巣くっていたけど、ロード・キャプテンが自ら足を運んで殲滅したんだってさ！」

languages.text: “你听说地下墓穴里发生的事情了吗？大家都说一群怪物和异端分子把那里当成了巢穴，但舰长大人亲自冲了过去，把他们全都暴揍了一顿！”
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"

traits.locale_text: “你听说地下墓穴里发生的事情了吗？大家都说一群怪物和异端分子把那里当成了巢穴，但舰长大人亲自冲了过去，把他们全都暴揍了一顿！”

languages.text: "Habt Ihr gehört, was in der Krypta geschehen ist? Angeblich hatten sich dort Ketzer und Monster eingenistet, aber der Lord Captain selbst hat sie alle erledigt!"
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr gehört, was in der Krypta geschehen ist? Angeblich hatten sich dort Ketzer und Monster eingenistet, aber der Lord Captain selbst hat sie alle erledigt!"

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu parler de ce qui s'est passé dans la crypte ? On raconte qu'une bande d'hérétiques et de monstres y avaient fait leur nid, mais que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} est {mf|allé|allée} les écraser en personne ! »
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu parler de ce qui s'est passé dans la crypte ? On raconte qu'une bande d'hérétiques et de monstres y avaient fait leur nid, mais que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} est {mf|allé|allée} les écraser en personne ! »

languages.text: "Mahzende olanları duydun mu? Bir grup kâfir ve canavar, orayı yuvaları bellemiş. Sonra Lord Kaptan bizzat gidip hepsinin oraya gömmüş!"
languages.original_text: "You heard what happened down in the crypt? They say a bunch o' heretics and monsters'd nested there, but the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} went and crushed them all!"
